channel.title: [HELP] Shops [317]
channel.description:
My problem is that i want to make a new shop - But it won't work.
I've got the NPC where i want him, And when i click him, a window opens, But none of the items are there - So its like an empty shop..
Heres what i've done so far;
in shops.cfg [code]shop = 54 @whi@*Mining_Supplies* 2 2 1264 1 1267 1 1269 1 1271 1 1273 1 1275 1 436 100 438 100 440 100 453 100 447 100 449 100 451 100 [/code]
in autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 1396 2723 3506 0 2725 3502 2725 3503 1[/code]
and in Client.java [code]} if(NPCID == 1396){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 54;[/code]
Is there something missing or i have i dont a obvious mistake or something? thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: [/size][hr]Also, how do i make it so stuff can be sold to shops, Because can't sell anything.

item.description:
@Snaz wrote:

thanks its working now.
